'''1.19.2''' is a hotfix to {{BE}}, released on June 22, 2022<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/7093790226573|title=Minecraft - 1.19.2 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 22, 2022}}</ref>, which fixed some bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed a bug on certain flat worlds where below-0 terrain was accidentally being removed on level load, if there was bedrock at y=0 ({{bug|MCPE-156679}}, {{bug|MCPE-156698}}).
* Mobs that teleport through a Nether portal with a destination above y=128 will no longer have their position adjusted to 128 ({{bug|MCPE-155465}}).
